children.content: And YHWH descended in the cloud and stood there with him as he called upon the name of YHWH.
Then YHWH passed by in front of him and proclaimed, “YHWH, YHWH God, compassionate and merciful, slow to anger, and abounding in faithfulness and truth;

who keeps faithfulness for thousands, who forgives wrongdoing, violation of His torah, and sin; yet He will by no means leave the guilty unpunished, inflicting the punishment of fathers on the children and on the grandchildren to the third and fourth generations.”
And Moses hurried to bow low toward the ground and worship.
